StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertO.cerWaiverLeter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID uniqueiden..er, @O.cerWaiverID int, @UploadDate date.me, @UploadedBy varchar(50) ) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_LETTER] WHERE OFFICER_WAIVER_LETTER_ID = @ID) BEGIN SELECT OFFICER_WAIVER_LETTER_ID FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_LETTER] WHERE OFFICER_WAIVER_LETTER_ID = @ID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_LETTER] ([OFFICER_WAIVER_LETTER_ID] ,[OFFICER_WAIVER_ID] ,[UPLOAD_DATE] ,[UPLOADED_BY] ) VALUES (@ID ,@O.cerWaiverID ,@UploadDate ,@UploadedBy ) END
